title: Engineering Ethics Education Design: Curriculum Based on Delphi Technique and Instructional Models

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of core engineering principles, practical experience, and foundational ethics concepts
context.additional_context: Context-specific engineering ethics education designed for office/administrative professionals, incorporating digital tools and practical project-based tasks.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze engineering ethics dilemma cases to develop a decision-making framework as professional practitioners.
Learners can systematically derive ethics education content for specific engineering fields using the Delphi technique.
Learners can apply instructional design models (e.g., ADDIE) to design ethics education programs and establish evaluation plans.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
